'''Preventive measures outside the context of a TIAC''' :

The preventive measures consist of applying scrupulous hygiene rules throughout the food preparation chain (source of food, transport, preparation), with staff education and the principle of moving forward in collective kitchens.

Prevention also involves medical surveillance of staff and the exclusion of certain agents depending on the risk, as well as routine microbiological sampling in the catering sector.

'''Preventive measures in the presence of a TIAC''' :

Consignment of suspect foodstuffs

Eviction of the source as soon as it is identified

Suspension of catering activities at an establishment pending the results of the investigation

question.title: What is the primary purpose of preventive measures in the presence of a TIAC?
question.description: Preventive measures outside the context of a TIAC are focused on applying scrupulous hygiene rules throughout the food preparation chain. What is the primary purpose of preventive measures in the presence of a TIAC?

option_a.title: To apply scrupulous hygiene rules throughout the food preparation chain
option_a.description: This option is a distractor that is plausible but incorrect, as it describes the primary purpose of preventive measures outside the context of a TIAC.

option_b.title: To evacuate the source of the contamination as soon as it is identified
option_b.description: This option is a distractor that is partially correct, but not the primary purpose of preventive measures in the presence of a TIAC.

option_c.title: To suspend catering activities at an establishment pending the results of the investigation
option_c.description: This option is a distractor that is partially correct, but not the primary purpose of preventive measures in the presence of a TIAC.

option_d.title: To consign suspect foodstuffs and evacuate the source of the contamination
option_d.description: This option is the correct answer, as it accurately describes the primary purpose of preventive measures in the presence of a TIAC.
